title: Dzhivan Mirzoyan
subtitle: Artist | Painter | Sculptor
biography:
Born in the capital of Armenia, Erevan, on December 2, 1949, he presents this exhibition in memory -and dedicated- to the 100th Anniversary of the First Republic of Armenia, achieved after independence from the yoke of the Genocidal Empire of Turkey, in May from 1918.

His life has passed in Saint Petersburg (Russia), where he settled when he was 17 years old, and where he studied at the Repin Academy of Fine Arts.

Since 2000 he lives in Spain, where he has made several exhibitions in various cities.

He is the author of the first monument in Spain, dedicated to the victims of the Armenian genocide, called THE CROSS OF LIFE, which is located in Mislata (Valencia).
